item.title: Joining Pivotal Cloud Foundry and Moving to Dublin
Joining SoundCloud and Moving to Berlin
item.description: {% img center /images/blog/career-break/berlin-reichstag.medium.jpg 900 %} I can’t say exactly when the job search began. It began with the creation of a Note in Evernote (great tool for this type of task). It was much different than any other job search I’ve done, though I haven’t done many as I tend to stick to job for at least 4 years at a time. The key difference with this search was that I wasn’t working, and wasn’t in a hurry to find a job.
